actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Executive Comment Requested from Justice, State.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to grant immigrant visas to certain nationals of Italy who were victims of earthquakes which occurred on or about November 23, 1980, in Italy.

summary.text: Grants immigrant visas to certain Italian nationals and their dependents who were victims of earthquakes which occurred in Italy on or about November 23, 1980. States that such visa shall not be chargeable against the numerical limitations imposed under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill to grant immigrant visas to certain nationals of Italy who were victims of earthquakes which occurred on or about November 23, 1980, in Italy.
